title: This new AI content generator conducts its own research, SEO, and more
content:
Macworld

TL;DR: Katteb AI Content Generator can create quality, researched, SEO content in moments, and it’s only $79.99 for a lifetime subscription. 

Content generator AI is already evolving. Not that long ago, AI could passably follow pretty basic prompts. Now, you can get a content generator that can generate fact-checked long-form SEO content in one moment and add optimized internal links the next. Katteb is a new type of AI content generator that is already making waves for its range, and a lifetime subscription just went on sale for $79.99 (reg. $195). 

What can Katteb do?

Katteb is kind of like having your own content creation team at the ready at all times. It can generate fact-checked articles with in-text citations, rewrite existing content, and optimize text for SEO. It also has tools for turning YouTube videos into written summaries, creating Amazon product reviews, and generating content from URLs. If you need to add internal links to your content, Katteb can do that automatically too.

This unique content generator supports over 100 languages and includes a built-in proofreading tool to catch errors. There’s also a plagiarism checker to make sure your content is original.

You can export finished work to WordPress, Blogger, or as a file. With 100,000 words per month included, it’s a practical option for anyone who needs a steady stream of AI-generated content.

And there’s still to get a lifetime subscription to Katteb AI Content Generator on sale for $79.99.
